title: From the chaos of snowboard cross, a repeat champ emerges.
summary_full: Alessandro Hämmerle of Austria came from behind to win another gold medal in the men’s event.
summary_public: Alessandro Hämmerle of Austria came from behind to win another gold medal in the men’s event.
